Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Movable, StaticEntity

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    Drawable.java Represents a single cell on the board
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Ewan Bradford, Luke Francis

    • Constructor Detail

      • Drawable

        public Drawable(int x,
                int y,
                java.lang.String sprite,
                int blockable)
        Creates drawable using position, an image file and a blocking value
        Parameters:
        x, - the x coordinate on the board this cell is at.
        y, - the y coordinate on the board this cell is at.
        sprite, - the filepath to the image file to be drawn
        blockable, - the blocking value of this cell. (0-Blocks nothing, 1-Blocks enemies, 2-Blocks enemies and player)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Board board,
                   Player player,
                   int keyboardIn)
        Handles the movement of this object.
        Parameters:
        board, - the parent board object.
        player, - the player object that is on the board.
        keyboardIn, - the current keypress.

        Parameters:
        integer - newBlocking value to be assigned
